name: I'm With Stupid
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam. The theme was "Out of Control" which made me think of a platformer where you couldn't control the character and suddenly he just did stupid things like walking off a cliff or waving his arms around and spitting everywhere.

But why would that happen? That's when I came up with the pills and the lab and how he needs the pills to stay smart enough to understand the player's instructions.

After that it was just about creating a fun atmosphere and getting a couple levels in.

I hope you enjoy it! If you have a gamepad plugged in, you'll need to use that.

Otherwise, keyboard is a little more difficult but still manageable with some practice.

No coyote time yet! Sorry! Needed to submit!

Note: If you get stuck you can reload the level by pressing select + start or "R" on the keyboard.
